data.title: Show your favourite riding helmet [Archive]
data.meta_description:
Hi Floks, 
 
It seems I am in the market for a new helmet, just wanted to see what everyone else is using and their experience. 
Please can you share your feedback about your helmet & may be pics if you like, thanks for all the help. 
 
I am currently using Arai RX 7 GP Edwards replica and really like it however a bit bored with it now, inclined towards the schuberth SR1. 
221225
